name: JDStatusBarNotification
summary: Highly customizable & feature rich notifications. Interactive dismiss. Custom Views. SwiftUI. Tap-to-hold. Progress.
description: Highly customizable & feature rich notifications displayed below the status bar. Customizable colors, fonts & animations. Supports notch and no-notch devices, landscape & portrait layouts and Drag-to-Dismiss. Can display a subtitle, an activity indicator, a progress bar & custom views or SwiftUI views out of the box.
